title: The applicant shall neither be entitled for any compensation for the removal of the development nor for any alternative land
clause_text: The applicant shall neither be entitled for any compensation for the removal of the development nor for any alternative land. The applicant if he desires may apply in writing for renewal of the permission.
section: (2) 10.14.3 Development of land Notified for Acquisition

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The applicant shall neither be entitled for any compensation for the removal of the development nor for any alternative land.
